components.appName:
NIH Data Commons Consortium Pilot Phase
NHLBI Data STAGE
GTEx & TOPMed Data Portal

introduction.heading: Data STAGE
introduction.text: Data STAGE supports the management, analysis and sharing of human disease data for the research community and aims to advance basic understanding of the genetic basis of complex traits and accelerate discovery and development of therapies, diagnostic tests, and other technologies for diseases like cancer. The data commons supports cross-project analyses by harmonizing data from different projects through the collaborative development of a data dictionary, providing an API for data queries and download, and providing a cloud-based analysis workspace with rich tools and resources.

buttons.name: Define Data Field
buttons.body: Data STAGE define the data in a general way. Please study the dictionary before you start browsing.
buttons.label: Learn more

buttons.name: Explore Data
buttons.body: The Exploration Page gives you insights and a clear overview under selected factors.
buttons.label: Explore data

buttons.name: Access Data
buttons.body: Use our selected tool to filter out the data you need.
buttons.label: Query data

buttons.name: Analyze Data
buttons.body: Analyze your selected cases using Jupyter Notebooks in our secure cloud environment
buttons.label: Run analysis

login.title: Data STAGE

login.text: This website supports the management, analysis and sharing of human disease data for the research community and aims to advance basic understanding of the genetic basis of complex traits and accelerate discovery and development of therapies, diagnostic tests, and other technologies for diseases like cancer.
login.contact: If you have any questions about access or the registration process, please contact
